details.publicNotes: A huge hyena ridden by a gem gnoll comes charging towards you. The gem gnoll shouts a war cry echoed by his bestial mount.

description.value: A long metal shaft ending with a metal spike, a spear can be used one‑handed as a melee weapon and can be thrown.
The nature of this spear is unclear.
A long metal shaft ending with a metal spike, a spear can be used one‑handed as a melee weapon and can be thrown.
A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.
The nature of this leather armor is unclear.
A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.
The gem gnoll burrows up to 15 feet straight up then makes a Strike.

While mounted, the gnoll has a Speed of 35 feet and it gains the following actions

Mounted Charge 2 Stride towards an enemy at least 15 feet away and Strike them, dealing 1 extra die of damage.

Spirited Gallop 2 Stride three times. The gnoll cannot do this again for 2 rounds.

Rideby Attack 2 Stride. They may Strike once during the Stride while still moving.
